snippet.title: Tomb Raider delayed for quality improvement
snippet.description:
Tomb Raider delayed for quality improvement
Lara Croft's rousing return to current-gen consoles has been pushed back to 2013, so developers at Crystal Dynamics can make Tomb Raider "the best game of their careers", apparently. The latest instalment of Tomb Raider was pegged for release this autumn, and while fresh content will be revealed at next month's E3 expo, the team â€¦
Caleb Cox, 14 May 2012
